block.l: var dict = new Map(), result = [], data = list.asArray(), len = data.length, i; for (i = 0; i < len; i += 1) { if (dict.has(data[i])) { dict.set(data[i], dict.get(data[i]) + 1); } else { dict.set(data[i], 1); } } dict.forEach(function (value, key) { result.push(new List([key, value])); }); return new List(result);

block.comment: find out how wide a digit is at two sizes
If smallest value < 0, the x axis isn't at the bottom. Note that sort is by > not by <. Not clear this can happen in a histogram!
Choose label format depending on label width vs. bar width.

block.l: var world=this.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph); if (!("stringLibCaseIndependentComparison" in world)) { world["stringLibCaseIndependentComparison"] = true; }; if (world["stringLibCaseIndependentComparison"]) { return 1+sup.toLocaleLowerCase().indexOf(sub.toLocaleLowerCase()); } else { return 1+sup.indexOf(sub); }
